brief: Johaug and Klaebo headline Norway's Olympic gold rush as Milano-Cortina 2026 reaches medal day.
Boe brothers hunt biathlon glory while Arsenal's title lead tested at Brentford tomorrow.
Liverpool chase leaders tonight at Sunderland ‚Äî three points essential to stay in race.

items.text: Today: Johaug targets 10km classic gold, Granerud and Lindvik chase ski jumping medals
Tomorrow: Boe brothers in biathlon individual, Kristoffersen and Braathen in giant slalom
Weekend: Klaebo's sprint free Friday, then the ultimate 50km mass start Sunday

radar: Hovland tees off Sunday at Pebble Beach with new swing changes ‚Äî AT&T Pro-Am perfect testing ground before Florida Swing begins.
Ruud's clay season preparation begins in two weeks with South American swing ‚Äî defending titles in Buenos Aires and Rio ahead of Monte Carlo Masters.
Carlsen returns to classical chess in March for Candidates tournament watching duties ‚Äî potential World Championship challenge brewing if Nepomniachtchi qualifies.
